title: Tawanthong Restaurant and Shop
description: A large market and vegetarian food restaurant, previously located opposite Khon Kaen museum and moved here in Apr 2015. Plenty of seating. Note that food selection lessens after 12pm and is generally finishes by 2:30pm. Sample items might be pumpkin soup, potato soup, pineapple and tomato soup, mixed broccoli, spinach soup, and raw vegetables. Uses palm oil. Market sells natural products including nutritional supplements, dry and frozen vegetarian food, herbal teas, body care products, and books.
